document.heading: Film DC Economic Incentive Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-187, the “Film DC Economic Incentive Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-477 which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 1, 2008, and May 6, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 20, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-381 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-187 became effective on July 18, 2008.
